title: Dujiangyan Luxury Suites at the Gateway to Qing Cheng Mountain
description:
Breathe in the natural wonder and serenity of Six Senses Qing Cheng Mountain, nestled among the lush forests and slopes of the ancient spiritual centre of China. The resort offers a rare glimpse into the region’s halcyon past. An extensive range of onsite wellness treatments, dining options and concierge-organised experiences are available, as well as unrivalled access to some of the region’s most cherished historic and cultural sites. Visit the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Dujiangyan Irrigation System and the mountain itself, which is home to 11 famous sacred Taoist temples.

You’ll be spoiled for choice, with four excellent restaurants - including traditional Thai favourites served with an incredible view at Sala Thai and authentic Sichuan and Cantonese dishes at Zi Qi Yuan Chinese Restaurant - and two bars. The resort also boasts an indoor heated pool, open year-round, and is less than a 10-minute drive from the stunning Dujiangyan Panda Valley, where visitors can see wild giant pandas and learn about the facility’s tireless efforts to preserve China’s iconic national treasures.
offer_address: 2 Dongruan Blvd, Dujiangyan City, Chengdu, Sichuan, China, 611844
